html: (2 Nephi 19:5)."For every battle of the warrior is with confused noise, and garments rolled in blood; but this shall be with burning and fuel of fire." Sidney Sperry interprets these phrases to read, "For every boot of him that tramps in tumult of battle … And every mantle rolled in blood … shall be for burning, fuel for fire." (BMC, 207.) "This 'burning' is to be the cleansing of the earth by fire prior to the setting up of the Messianic kingdom." (LDSKJ, Isaiah 9:5, footnote b; see also Ezekiel 39:9; BICQ, 103-4.)
